forum.name: Making Connections to College and Career Readiness Standards
forum.intro:
Review the College and Career Readiness Standards for Geometry. Consider how activities from this module connect to those standards.

Choose an activity from Module 5 that addresses one or more of the CCR Standards for Geometry and share your thoughts in the discussion forum below. Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to add a post to the forum.

  • Provide the activity name in the subject of the post (e.g., “Classifying Quadrilaterals”).
  • Explain how the activity addresses the standards.
  • Respond to the following: Does the activity provide opportunities for adult learners to see connections between standards? If yes, how so? If not, what ideas do you have for providing an opportunity to connect to at least one other standard?
